trigonometric: Za kapena zokhudzana ndi mfundo za trigonometry
ngodya: Danga pakati pa mizere iwiri kapena ndege zomwe zimadutsana
moyandikana: Kukhala ndi malire wamba kapena m'mphepete
radian: Chigawo cha ngodya ya ndege yofanana ndi ngodya yomwe ili pakatikati pa bwalo lopangidwa ndi arc yofanana muutali ndi utali wozungulira.
sine: Chiyerekezo cha utali wa mbali moyang'anizana ndi ngodya yomwe wapatsidwa ndi kutalika kwa hypotenuse ya makona atatu akumanja
kodi: Chiŵerengero cha mbali yoyandikana ndi hypotenuse ya makona atatu akumanja
tangent: Mzere womwe umakhudza kopindika pa mfundo imodzi yokha
secant: Mzere wowongoka womwe umadutsana ndi nsonga ziwiri kapena zingapo
pythagorean theorem: Ubale wofunikira mu geometry ya Euclidean pakati pa mbali zitatu za makona atatu akumanja
ntchito nthawi: Ntchito yomwe imabwereza makonda ake pakapita nthawi kapena pakanthawi
matalikidwe: Kusamuka kwakukulu kapena mtunda wosunthidwa ndi mfundo pa thupi lonjenjemera kapena mafunde
mlingo wa digiri: Muyeso wa ngodya mu madigiri, pomwe bwalo lathunthu limagawidwa kukhala madigiri 360
